sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO EAE ( EAE_ID, COLLEAGUE_ID, MANAGER_ID, EAE_DATE, PROFILE_LABEL, PREVIOUS_EAE_ID, COLLEAGUES_STRENGTHS, COLLEAGUES_WEAKNESSES, EAE_STATE_ID, COLLEAGUES_SYNTHESIS, MANAGERS_SYNTHESIS, OTHER )values ( #id# , #colleague.id# , #manager.id# , #dateEae# , #profileLabel# , #previousEaeId# , #colleaguesStrengths# , #colleaguesWeaknesses# , #eaeState.id# , #colleaguesSynthesis# , #managersSynthesis# , #other# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS EAE_ID
sqlMap.update: UPDATE EAE SET COLLEAGUE_ID = #colleague.id#, MANAGER_ID = #manager.id#, EAE_DATE = #dateEae#, PROFILE_LABEL = #profileLabel#, PREVIOUS_EAE_ID = #previousEaeId#, COLLEAGUES_STRENGTHS = #colleaguesStrengths#, COLLEAGUES_WEAKNESSES = #colleaguesWeaknesses#, EAE_STATE_ID = #eaeState.id#, COLLEAGUES_SYNTHESIS = #colleaguesSynthesis#, MANAGERS_SYNTHESIS = #managersSynthesis#, OTHER = #other# WHERE EAE_ID = #id#
UPDATE EAE SET SALARY = #salary# WHERE EAE_ID = #id#
UPDATE EAE SET YEAR_SYNTHESIS = #yearSynthesis#, COLLEAGUES_STRENGTHS = #collabStrenghts#, COLLEAGUES_WEAKNESSES = #collabWeaknesses#, MEANS_TO_PROGRESS = #meansToProgress# WHERE EAE_ID = #id#
UPDATE EAE SET COLLEAGUES_SYNTHESIS = #colleaguesSynthesis#, MANAGERS_SYNTHESIS = #managersSynthesis#, OTHER = #other#, WHERE EAE_ID = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT eae.EAE_ID as "EAE_ID", c.LAST_NAME as "LAST_NAME", c.FIRST_NAME as "FIRST_NAME", eae.EAE_DATE as "EAE_DATE", es.EAE_STATE_ID as "EAE_STATE_ID", es.EAE_STATE_LABEL as "EAE_STATE_LABEL" FROM COLLEAGUE c, EAE eae, EAE_STATE es WHERE c.COLLEAGUE_ID = eae.COLLEAGUE_ID AND eae.EAE_STATE_ID = es.EAE_STATE_ID AND eae.MANAGER_ID = #id# AND eae.EAE_STATE_ID IN (1,2)

SELECT * FROM COLLEAGUE c LEFT JOIN EAE e ON c.COLLEAGUE_ID = e.COLLEAGUE_ID WHERE c.MANAGER_ID = #id# and c.COLLEAGUE_ID not in (select EAE.colleague_ID from EAE where EAE.MANAGER_ID=#id# and EAE.EAE_STATE_ID in (1,2));

SELECT EAE.EAE_ID, "" as "LAST_NAME", "" as "FIRST_NAME", EAE.EAE_DATE, EAE.EAE_STATE_ID, EAE_STATE.EAE_STATE_LABEL FROM EAE , EAE_STATE where EAE.COLLEAGUE_ID = #id# and EAE.EAE_STATE_ID = EAE_STATE.EAE_STATE_ID ;

SELECT eae.EAE_ID as "EAE_ID", col.LAST_NAME as "C_LAST_NAME", col.FIRST_NAME as "C_FIRST_NAME", prof.PROFILE_TYPE as "PROFILE", man.LAST_NAME as "M_LAST_NAME", man.FIRST_NAME as "M_FIRST_NAME", eae.EAE_STATE_ID as "EAE_STATE_ID", eae.EAE_DATE as "EAE_DATE", col.EMPLOYMENT_DATE as "EMPLOYMENT_DATE", prevEae.EAE_DATE as "PREV_EAE_DATE", eae.SALARY as "SALARY" FROM EAE eae LEFT JOIN EAE prevEae ON eae.PREVIOUS_EAE_ID = prevEae.EAE_ID, COLLEAGUE col, PROFILE prof, COLLEAGUE man WHERE eae.EAE_ID = #id# AND eae.COLLEAGUE_ID = col.COLLEAGUE_ID AND col.PROFILE_ID = prof.PROFILE_ID AND col.MANAGER_ID = man.COLLEAGUE_ID ;
SELECT EAE_ID, YEAR_SYNTHESIS, COLLEAGUES_STRENGTHS, COLLEAGUES_WEAKNESSES, MEANS_TO_PROGRESS FROM EAE WHERE EAE_ID = #id#
SELECT EAE_ID, COLLEAGUES_SYNTHESIS, MANAGERS_SYNTHESIS, OTHER FROM EAE WHERE EAE_ID = #id#
SELECT EAE_ID FROM EAE WHERE COLLEAGUE_ID=#id# AND EAE_STATE_ID=1;

SELECT C.COLLEAGUE_ID AS "COLLEAGUE_ID", C.LAST_NAME AS "C_LAST_NAME", C.FIRST_NAME AS "C_FIRST_NAME" , E.EAE_ID AS "EAE_ID", E.EAE_STATE_ID AS "EAE_STATE_ID", C.TITLE as "TITLE_ID", MAX(E.EAE_DATE) AS EAE_DATE FROM EAE E, COLLEAGUE C WHERE C.COLLEAGUE_ID = E.COLLEAGUE_ID AND C.MANAGER_ID=#id# GROUP BY C.COLLEAGUE_ID;
